oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Identifying and Modeling Evaporite Facies using Well Logs: Characterising the Devonian Elk Point Group salt giant
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lord, Elaine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This dataverse is associated with a masters degree titled "Identifying and Modeling Evaporite Facies using Well Logs: Characterising the Devonian Elk Point Group salt giant" by Elaine Lord (2020). Figures and well tables are included.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Evaporite sedimentology
Salt giant
Prairie Evaporite
